title: The Rolling Stones Announce New Album 'Hackney Diamonds'
content: The Rolling Stones have officially announced their first album of original material in 18 years...
author: Mick Jagger

title: U2:UV Achtung Baby Live At Sphere
content: U2 has announced a new run of dates for their residency in Las Vegas...
author: Bono

title: Review: 'The Bends' by Radiohead
content: A timeless classic that marked a turning point for the band...
author: Thom Yorke
